name: Purple Polka - Ladies long sleeve cardigan
description:
This simple yet charming V neck long sleeve cardigan has been hand decorated with a snazzy designer button with polka dot ribbon and a fancy vintage cream lace yoyo. 
Which i then turned it into a mock corsage!
Great for a casual night out to the movies worn with a lovely pair of pants or one of your favourite skirts or dresses..

**If you are interested in similar styling or detail but are after a different color and or size pls contact me as I do also take custom made orders***

name: Chocolat Pearl - Ladies long sleeve cardigan
description:
This is a one off unique cardigan that has been Hand Embellished with beautiful Australian Designer flower shaped motifs along the neckline and at sleeve cuff.
To add a little sophistication to the cardigan I have hand sewn pre-loved pearls at each 2D flower and on each of the buttons. Finished off with a Remnant pearl colored ribbon turned into a bow at chest.

Can be worn undone or just one little button at top with one of your favourite skirts or dresses for a lovely evening out

This is Available now in size 12 in Chocolat

**If you are interested in similar styling or detail but are after a different color and or size pls contact me as I do also take custom made orders***

name: Miss Fancy - Girls long sleeve Cardigan
description:
Girls Size 10 long sleeve knitted cardigan.
Pre-made in a 100% cotton knit with ribbed hem and cuffs.
This Fancy girls cardigan has been Embellished with 1960's italian borderie anglais and finished off with a 1970's dome shaped button at the decorative fan.

Perfect for your little loved one or for a special gift for someone! 
Can be worn buttoned up or undone with a lovely spring white dress. 

**If you are interested in similar styling or detail but are after a different color and or size pls contact me as I do also take custom made orders***

name: Miss Doolittle - Girls long sleeve cardigan
description:
This Charming girls cardigan, perfect for a one year old has been hand embellished with a love of vintage doilies and buttons. 

This is a 100% cotton knitted cardigan with ribbed hem and cuffs. Along with a round neckline which has been decorated with a doiley done in crochet and hand made ribbon bows in a soft pink. 
Cardigan has gathered sleeves at shoulder adding that cuteness and finished with ivory pearl toned vintage buttons with soft pink thread color. 

You can be sure you are purchasing a unique gift for the littlest love of your life with this piece.


**If you are interested in similar styling or detail but are after a different color and or size pls contact me as I do also take custom made orders***

name: Peaches & Cream - Girls long sleeve cardigan
description:
This sweet creation has been hand embellished completely with vintage cream frilly lace. I have Hand sewn the frilly lace along the neckline, Front button placket, and sleeve cuff. 
I have added a pre-loved pearl and frilly lace decoration at the chest to finish off this stylish cardigan.

Your little loved one can wear Peaches & Cream cardigan with a matching cream tutu or dress up some simple trousers! 

**If you are interested in similar styling or detail but are after a different color and or size pls contact me as I do also take custom made orders***
